descriptionHtml:
A simple texture replacement for Odahviing based on the dragon from the game Drakengard.

Installation
Extract the data folder  to your skyrim directory (C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim) and replace all.
There are two folders in the \"Angelus Lv3\" archive, Ancient and regular. Ancient replaces the original model with the ancient dragon (though it does not replace the ancient dragon texture) and regular is just the usual Ohdaviing model.
No differences in power between Lv1-2 and Lv3, just looks.

Uninstallation
Go to C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\meshes\\actors\\dragon and delete dragonohdaviing.nif
Then go to  C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\textures\\actors\\dragon and delete the following.
  translucentwings_ohdaviing.dds
  ohdaviing_g1.dds
  ohdaviing_g.dds
  ohdaviing.dds
  dragon_ohdaviing_lod.dds

**Note: This is my first ANYTHING on a nexus site (besides a picture...). Sorry if it\'s not up to par with the usual mod or retex.
author: Rathymos
